Module com.example.loginpage
Package com.example.loginpage.module.users.typeofuser

Class Client

java.lang.Object
com.example.loginpage.module.users.User
com.example.loginpage.module.users.typeofuser.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
FavouritesObserver, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BannedClient, NotBannedClient
public class Client extends User
Represents a client user in the system. Client users usually do not have administrative privileges. This class extends User,providing all available functionality.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Client

      public Client()
      Default constructor that initializes a new client with default settings.

    • Client

      public Client(String name, String email, String phone, String password, boolean isAdmin)
      Constructs a new client with detailed user information and admin status.
      Parameters:
      name - Client's full name.
      email - Client's email address.
      phone - Client's phone number.
      password - Client's password for authentication.
      isAdmin - Indicates whether the client should have administrative privileges (typically false for clients).

  • Method Details

      Purchases a book and prints out a confirmation.
      Parameters:
      book - The book to be purchased by the client.
